A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie was a large disappointment. The big space chase was tragically slow and boring\, none of the characters seemed to have direction\, and the major plot actions that happened to Leia\, Luke\, and the First Order capital ship we're so absurd that it pulled me out of the story to think: what were they thinking? A waste of time that would be hugely improved if edited down to just an hour long.
